hero.title: Personal, professional and financial development.
hero.description: My name is Eduardo Paiva and I've been working as a developer for over 5 years. Early in my career I realized the irony and difficulty of the class to develop beyond the technical field. Here you find information and training in technology, culture, entertainment, financial independence and geographical freedom.

footer.description: Technology and information hub focused on formative and disruptive content. Break the code, the frontier, your limits and limitations.
footer.suggestion: Do you have any content suggestions, contributions or improvements you'd like to share with us?

blog.title: Blog
blog.subtitle: Thoughts, teachings and some other things.
